title: Nhat Tran
text: Business Analytics graduate student at Boston University with experience in macro research, financial analytics, and data-driven decision-making, built on an academic foundation in finance and economics from Drexel University. I specialize in building automated workflows, developing analytical models, and translating complex datasets into clear, actionable insights that support business and investment strategies.
